content: spiked granny blanket materials yarn any yarn will work i used medium/dk weight for my example blanket crochet hook any hook will work i used a i hook for my example blanket 5 5 mm scissors stitch markers crochet stitches needed chain chain stitch st skip skip slip_stitch slip_stitch video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here double_crochet stitch double_crochet video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here granny spike stitch gss video tutorial here step by step photo tutorial here spiked granny blanket pattern make chs in the multiple of 3 + 2 i made 152 chs for my example blanket row 1 2 double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook *chain 1 skip 3 chain 3 double_crochet into next chain repeat from * until the end of the row row 2 chain 4 1 gss in first open space *chain 1 1 gss in next open space repeat from * until last open space of row chain 1 skip 1 st 1 double_crochet in last st of row row 3 chain 3 counts as 1 double_crochet 1 spiked double_crochet into top of previous double_crochet made in row middle of gss 1 double_crochet in same open stitch 1 gss made *chain 1 1 gss in next open space repeat from * until end of row alternate between row 2 and 3 to reach desired length you can view this free pattern on my blog here too i have a video tutorial on this blanket here i have a step by step photo tutorial on this blanket here playlist featuring some more free blanket tutorials here ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ ❈ follow crochet me lovely on all social media @crochetmelovely if you want to learn new stitches and techniques subscribe to my youtube channel here find more patterns on my blog here if you have any questions about this pattern email me at crochetmelovely@yahoo com thank you for downloading this pattern enjoy
